main event: A silver object with red tips and intermittent exhaust was observed flying horizontally before disappearing in Garden City, Michigan in 1963.
interesting points: The object was seen by two people sitting in a car waiting out a storm.
The object suddenly shot straight up at a very fast speed and disappeared.
The witness was amazed and could not stop thinking about the sighting.
The witness asked if there had been any other similar sightings reported in the area.
The Air Force could not provide an evaluation of the sighting and concluded there was no evidence the object represented an intelligently controlled vehicle.
sighted object: a silver object with red tips and intermittent exhaust
witnesses: two people sitting in a car
